amendatorysection.catchline: Interest; effect on purchase of certain lands.
amendatorysection.para: The rate of interest fixed by sections 45-101.02 to 45-106 shall not affect interest on purchase money of school, university, and agricultural college lands, or on lands delinquent or sold for the nonpayment of taxes.

crossreference.para: For provisions for payment of interest on redemption from sale for taxes, see sections 77-1824 and 77-1830.
